32 /* PRIVATE */
33 
34 #define STORAGE_HASH_VAL(arg) bgpstream_addr_storage_hash(&(arg))
35 #define STORAGE_EQUAL_VAL(arg1, arg2) \
36  bgpstream_addr_storage_equal(&(arg1), &(arg2))
37 
38 #define V4_HASH_VAL(arg) bgpstream_ipv4_addr_hash(&(arg))
39 #define V4_EQUAL_VAL(arg1, arg2) \
40  bgpstream_ipv4_addr_equal(&(arg1), &(arg2))
41 
42 #define V6_HASH_VAL(arg) bgpstream_ipv6_addr_hash(&(arg))
43 #define V6_EQUAL_VAL(arg1, arg2) \
44  bgpstream_ipv6_addr_equal(&(arg1), &(arg2))
45 
46 /* STORAGE */
47 KHASH_INIT(bgpstream_addr_storage_set /* name */,
48  bgpstream_addr_storage_t /* khkey_t */,
49  char /* khval_t */,
50  0 /* kh_is_set */,
51  STORAGE_HASH_VAL /*__hash_func */,
52  STORAGE_EQUAL_VAL /* __hash_equal */);
53 
54 
55 struct bgpstream_addr_storage_set {
56  khash_t(bgpstream_addr_storage_set) *hash;
57 };
58 
59 
60 /* IPv4 */
61 KHASH_INIT(bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set /* name */,
62  bgpstream_ipv4_addr_t /* khkey_t */,
63  char /* khval_t */,
64  0 /* kh_is_set */,
65  V4_HASH_VAL /*__hash_func */,
66  V4_EQUAL_VAL /* __hash_equal */);
67 
68 struct bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set {
69  khash_t(bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set) *hash;
70 };
71 
72 
73 /* IPv6 */
74 KHASH_INIT(bgpstream_ipv6_addr_set /* name */,
75  bgpstream_ipv6_addr_t /* khkey_t */,
76  char /* khval_t */,
77  0 /* kh_is_set */,
78  V6_HASH_VAL /*__hash_func */,
79  V6_EQUAL_VAL /* __hash_equal */);
80 
81 struct bgpstream_ipv6_addr_set {
82  khash_t(bgpstream_ipv6_addr_set) *hash;
83 };
84 
85 /* PUBLIC FUNCTIONS */
86 
87 
88 /* STORAGE */
89 
90 bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t *bgpstream_addr_storage_set_create()
91 {
92  bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t *set;
93 
94  if((set =
95  (bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t*)
96  malloc(sizeof(bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t))) == NULL)
97  {
98  return NULL;
99  }
100 
101  if((set->hash = kh_init(bgpstream_addr_storage_set)) == NULL)
102  {
103  bgpstream_addr_storage_set_destroy(set);
104  return NULL;
105  }
106 
107  return set;
108 }
109 
110 int bgpstream_addr_storage_set_insert(bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t *set,
111  bgpstream_addr_storage_t *addr)
112 {
113  int khret;
114  khiter_t k;
115  if((k = kh_get(bgpstream_addr_storage_set, set->hash, *addr)) ==
116  kh_end(set->hash))
117  {
118  k = kh_put(bgpstream_addr_storage_set, set->hash, *addr, &khret);
119  return 1;
120  }
121  return 0;
122 }
123 
124 int bgpstream_addr_storage_set_size(bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t *set)
125 {
126  return kh_size(set->hash);
127 }
128 
129 int bgpstream_addr_storage_set_merge(bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t *dst_set,
130  bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t *src_set)
131 {
132  khiter_t k;
133  for(k = kh_begin(src_set->hash); k != kh_end(src_set->hash); ++k)
134  {
135  if(kh_exist(src_set->hash, k))
136  {
137  if(bgpstream_addr_storage_set_insert(dst_set,
138  &(kh_key(src_set->hash, k))) <0)
139  {
140  return -1;
141  }
142  }
143  }
144  return 0;
145 }
146 
147 void bgpstream_addr_storage_set_destroy(bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t *set)
148 {
149  kh_destroy(bgpstream_addr_storage_set, set->hash);
150  free(set);
151 }
152 
153 void bgpstream_addr_storage_set_clear(bgpstream_addr_storage_set_t *set)
154 {
155  kh_clear(bgpstream_addr_storage_set, set->hash);
156 }
157

182 int bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set_insert(bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set_t *set,
183  bgpstream_ipv4_addr_t *addr)
184 {
185  int khret;
186  khiter_t k;
187  if((k = kh_get(bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set, set->hash, *addr)) ==
188  kh_end(set->hash))

190  k = kh_put(bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set, set->hash, *addr, &khret);
191  return 1;
192  }
193  return 0;
194 }

201 int bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set_merge(bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set_t *dst_set,
202  bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set_t *src_set)
203 {
204  khiter_t k;
205  for(k = kh_begin(src_set->hash); k != kh_end(src_set->hash); ++k)
206  {
207  if(kh_exist(src_set->hash, k))
208  {
209  if(bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set_insert(dst_set,
210  &(kh_key(src_set->hash, k))) <0)
211  {
212  return -1;
213  }
214  }
215  }
216  return 0;
217 }
